description:
In the underwater metropolis world, there is an "Ocean Star" that can absorb ocean pollution. During a fight between the sheep and wolves, the "Ocean Star" splits into many pieces and scatters in the sea. In order to collect more fragments and get the control of the "Ocean Star", the sheep and the grey wolf fight with each other to collect fragments one after another in the seabed.
source: bgm.tv/deepl

OTHER: 33:喜羊羊与灰太狼之深海历险记

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Shenhai Lixian Ji
喜羊羊与灰太狼之深海历险记
